formalpara.title: Figure 2. Wild type and some mutants of Oscheius tipulae.
formalpara.para: A. Wild type CEW1. An adult hermaphrodite, embryos and various larval stages are visible. B. Dumpy phenotype (mutant sy536). C. Egg-laying defective phenotype (mutant sy537) with bags of larvae. D. Twitcher phenotype (mutant sy486). E. Kinker phenotype (mutant sy474). F. Coiler phenotype (mutant sy445).
